Environment

Class RoomSquare

  • java.lang.Object
    • Environment.Square
      • Environment.RoomSquare

  • public class RoomSquare
extends Square
    The room class extends square and represents a square in a room area of a board. It holds information on who is in the room and what corridors and rooms they connect to via secret passages and doorways.

      • Fields inherited from class Environment.Square
